source.description: URI that identifies the context in which an event happened.

type.description: The type of event related to the originating occurrence.

spec-version.description: The version of the CloudEvents specification which the event uses.

id.description: A string that identifies the event.

time.description: Timestamp of when the occurrence happened, or null if no value.

data-content-type.description: The content type of the data value.

subject.description: The subject of the event in the context of the event producer, or null if no value.

data-schema.description: URI that identifies the schema the data adheres to, or null if no value.
